00021 enum AkCallbackType
00022 {
00023     AK_EndOfEvent                   = 0x0001,   
00024     AK_EndOfDynamicSequenceItem     = 0x0002,   
00025     AK_Marker                       = 0x0004,   
00026     AK_Duration                     = 0x0008,   
00027 
00028     AK_SpeakerVolumeMatrix          = 0x0010,   
00029 
00030     AK_Starvation                   = 0x0020,   
00031 
00032     AK_MusicPlaylistSelect          = 0x0040,   
00033     AK_MusicPlayStarted             = 0x0080,   
00034 
00035     AK_MusicSyncBeat                = 0x0100,   
00036     AK_MusicSyncBar                 = 0x0200,   
00037     AK_MusicSyncEntry               = 0x0400,   
00038     AK_MusicSyncExit                = 0x0800,   
00039     AK_MusicSyncGrid                = 0x1000,   
00040     AK_MusicSyncUserCue             = 0x2000,   
00041     AK_MusicSyncPoint               = 0x4000,   
00042     AK_MusicSyncAll                 = 0x7f00,   
00043 
00044     AK_MidiEvent                    = 0x10000,  
00045 
00046     AK_CallbackBits                 = 0xfffff,  
00047 
00048     // Not callback types, but need to be part of same bitfield for AK::SoundEngine::PostEvent().
00049     AK_EnableGetSourcePlayPosition  = 0x100000, 
00050     AK_EnableGetMusicPlayPosition   = 0x200000, 
00051     AK_EnableGetSourceStreamBuffering = 0x400000    
00052 };

00061     AkGameObjectID  gameObjID;      
00062 };
